input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring delta’s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Training Bib 3.0'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Aeon Bib Short'
  - Name='Maap Aeon Bib Shorts Black'
  - Name='Maap Alt_Road Cargo 2.0 bib shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Training Bib 3.0 Moisture Wicking Bib Shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Pro Bib 2.0 Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Cycling Bib Short'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Amani Pro Team Training Cargo bib shorts Black'
  - Name='Rapha Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Element Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Core Bibs'
  - Name='Men's Rapha EF-Education First Pro Team 2025 Regular Bib Shorts black'
  - Name='Men's Attack Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R Bib Shorts S11 Men's'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Cycling Shorts with Liner'
  - Name='Sportful Fiandre Light Bib shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's Xtract II Gel Bib Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS Mille Gt Bib Shorts C2'
  - Name='Men's PRO Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a high-end cycling bib short, similar in function, construction, and intended use as the reference product. Both target performance riders and long-ride comfort.
A functional and performance-oriented bib short. Very similar, but likely prioritizes value or training over absolute high-end features.
Premium bib short from MAAP with advanced features, aimed at the same use case and customer as the reference product.
Identical to the above; a premium cycling bib short that matches the reference product in use and construction.
Has similar core features but includes cargo pockets, suggesting a slightly different target use (gravel/adventure), making it less perfectly aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Training Bib 3.0 Moisture Wicking Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Equivalent to other MAAP Training Bib 3.0 variants; moisture wicking aligns with comfort/performance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Pro Bib 2.0 Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Purpose-built for high performance and long rides, similar in premium construction to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for pro-level training, highly comparable in features, comfort, and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Cycling Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct competitor; fulfills the same function, silhouette, and high-performance build.
Still a premium bib but geared more towards comfort and less technical racing focus than 'Pro' models.
Still a premium bib but geared more towards comfort and less technical racing focus than 'Pro' models.
Same as above, essentially a duplicate.
Same as above, essentially a duplicate.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Amani Pro Team Training Cargo bib shorts Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro team construction but cargo pockets slightly differentiate the intended use toward all-road/gravel, rather than pure road.
Quality bib shorts but positioned as Rapha's mid-tier line, lacking some of the premium features.
Designed for long endurance rides, good overlap, but may prioritize utility and weather protection.
Premium and versatile bib shorts focused on comfort, similar though possibly less technical than the reference product.
Rapha’s entry-level bib, sharing the silhouette and core function but likely less technical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Rapha EF-Education First Pro Team 2025 Regular Bib Shorts black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pro-level race bib—very similar in every way to the reference product.
Generic name but likely a performance bib short, albeit potentially at a mid-range price and feature set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Castelli's flagship race bib, engineered for pro-level use, matches the reference for performance and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R Bib Shorts S11 Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end, pro-level bib shorts from a leading technical brand; highly targeted at the same customer.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Cycling Shorts with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Loose cycling shorts with a liner, aimed at mountain/gravel, different silhouette and intended use.
A performance-oriented bib, possibly with extra weather resistance—aligns closely with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Xtract II Gel Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Entry to mid-level bib shorts, similar in silhouette and function, but lacking high-end/pro features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Mille Gt Bib Shorts C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium, performance-oriented bib shorts for long rides—closely aligned with the reference.
Assumed to be a high-performance bib short, but with generic branding the match is good but not perfect.
